block-text-1: Use a unified knowledge base, form your own collection of articles, books, videos, courses, frameworks and tools according to the skills that are needed for your specialty.
block-text-2: Follow new materials from people who have developed the same skills or are still working on it and from people of the same specialty. Share materials with collegues and friends.
block-text-3: Create a step-by-step training plan based on collections of materials to achieve goals and monitor your progress.
